name: file.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: tfile.fs.output.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataOutputStream in bytes.

name: dfs.datanode.block.id.layout.upgrade.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when creating hard links from
    current to previous blocks during upgrade of a DataNode to block ID-based
    block layout (see HDFS-6482 for details on the layout).

name: dfs.journalnode.edits.dir.perm
description:
Permissions for the directories on on the local filesystem where
      the DFS journal node stores the edits. The permissions can either be
      octal or symbolic.

name: dfs.client.retry.interval-ms.get-last-block-length
description:
Retry interval in milliseconds to wait between retries in getting
    block lengths from the datanodes.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.concurrency-level
description:
Uses the concurrency level to create a fixed number of hashtable
    segments, each governed by its own write lock.

name: seq.io.sort.mb
